<file path="source.swift">
import Foundation

~enum TemperatureScale:
    case celsius = "°C"
    case fahrenheit = "°F"

~enum TemperatureError:
    case negativeAbsolute
~func convert(_: Double, from: TemperatureScale, to: TemperatureScale) -> Double?
-func demo()
-func validateTemperature(_: Double, scale: TemperatureScale) -> Bool
~var defaultScale: TemperatureScale
</file>
